name: Max Payne Model File
summary: Learn about .KFS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The Max Payne game uses three different file formats to illustrate the game environment. Along with the KFS file, the game uses .KF2 files and .SKD files.
NOTE: The KFS file for Max Payne is located in the data\​database\​skins\​max_payne path of the game directory.

description: Game file used by Max Payne, a violent, third-person shooter noir video game; contains character models, including textures and meshes, that make up Max Payne and other characters in the game.
